str2: So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To wait for, expect. From ek and dechomai; to accept from some source, i.e. to await.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.
